title: Crooked Goat Horn
content:
Crooked Goat Horn is an item collected with the Gatherer profession. A Hand Rake is required to harvest. Players recieve 71 xp in Gatherer.

Used with the B.R.E.W.S. Vat to create a reagent used in most early recipes in the Bonewright profession.

Stored in the Bones Bank, currently found in Bear Clearing and Two Headed Bear Clearing in Hopeforest or in Bone Vats in Mine of Mantuban.

Crooked Goat Horn can be purchased from Jangle's Bone Shop.
